detail_desc: Calf-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon with a high, elasticated waist. Lined.
Cap in soft cotton corduroy with covered elastication at the back.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Fitted jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fitted jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a soft faux shearling tongue. Soft faux shearling linings and insoles, and patterned soles.

Platform sandals with open toes, crossover foot straps and an adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a round metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front approx. 2 cm. Heel 9.5 cm.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Fully-fashioned trainers in mesh with imitation leather details. Ribbed elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Fully-fashioned trainers in mesh with imitation leather details. Ribbed elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and chunky, patterned soles.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with a button and narrow, decorative frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Recycled polyester lining.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with a button and narrow, decorative frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Recycled polyester lining.

Puffer jacket in windproof, water-repellent fabric with a detachable, lined drawstring hood that has a faux fur trim. Zip down the front and a wind flap with press-studs. Fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, flap patch pockets with press-studs and one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in imitation leather with fringing around the yoke and down the sleeves. Collar, dropped shoulders and discreet side pockets. Press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Short-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, back and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, and straight legs.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, back and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, and straight legs.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams under the bust and on the skirt for added width.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams under the bust and on the skirt for added width.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams under the bust and on the skirt for added width.
Alice band with a decorative knot detail at the top.
Alice band with a decorative knot detail at the top.
Alice band with a decorative knot detail at the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Chinos in cotton twill with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal front pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.

Chinos in cotton twill with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal front pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Fitted cardigan in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck and eyelet buttoning down the front. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted cardigan in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck and eyelet buttoning down the front. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted cardigan in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck and eyelet buttoning down the front. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.

Dress in an airy cotton weave with a square neckline, small opening with a button at the back and flounces at the top that continue up over the shoulders. Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.

Dress in an airy cotton weave with a square neckline, small opening with a button at the back and flounces at the top that continue up over the shoulders. Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.

Set in an airy, organic cotton weave. Wrapover dress with flutter sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist, concealed press-stud and decorative bow at one side and a flared skirt. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and narrow elastication and a small frill trim around the legs.

Set in an airy, organic cotton weave. Wrapover dress with flutter sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist, concealed press-stud and decorative bow at one side and a flared skirt. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and narrow elastication and a small frill trim around the legs.
Shorts in a linen and viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Shorts in a linen and viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and short slits in the sides.

5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front. Double-layered, wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, button fly and wide, straight legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Square neckline, a jersey lining at the top, gentle draping over the bust and an open back with lacing. Concealed zip in one side and 3/4-length puff sleeves with covered elastication over the shoulders and wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Square neckline, a jersey lining at the top, gentle draping over the bust and an open back with lacing. Concealed zip in one side and 3/4-length puff sleeves with covered elastication over the shoulders and wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in airy linen jersey. Deep V-neck at the back with a knot detail.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a smocked bodice and narrow shoulder straps with decorative bows at the top. Gathered tier to create volume and movement in the skirt. Unlined.

Short, voluminous dress in an airy, pattern-weave cotton blend with a crinkled effect. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide flounce layered over the top. Lined.

Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets with a zip, and slim, tapered legs with cuffed hems.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets with a zip, and slim, tapered legs with cuffed hems.

Fully-fashioned trainers with a glittery heel cap and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh insoles and textured soles.
Slip-on trainers in mesh with elastic gores in the sides. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Slip-on trainers in mesh with elastic gores in the sides. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Sandals in leather with square toes, covered block heels and narrow straps that wind and tie around the ankle. Leather linings and insoles and finely fluted rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
